name: RequirementsEngineer
description: Translates user requests into formal requirements.

name: SolutionArchitect
description: Designs a high-level solution to meet the requirements.

name: StructureAnalyzer
description: Analyzes the codebase structure using ASTs and call graphs.

name: TechnicalAnalyst
description: Evaluates and selects the optimal technical solution.

name: DiffAgent
description: Generates code changes (diffs) based on a selected solution.
